title: N-600 | Application for Certificate of Citizenship
description: Use this form to apply for a Certificate of Citizenship.

filings.category: If you, as a current or former member of any branch of the U.S. armed forces, are requesting a Certificate of Citizenship for yourself.NOTE: Children of service members do not qualify for this fee exemption.

If you are filing on behalf of an individual who is the subject of a final adoption for immigration purposes and meets (or met before 18 years of age) the definition of child under the Immigration and Nationality Act section 101(b)(1)(E), (F), or (G).
